original_text: Jacob kept these lambs separate from Laban's animals. He took the rest of Laban's female animals to join with the animals that had marks or were black. In that way he got more animals that would belong to him. He kept them separate from Laban's animals.
korean_text: 야곱이 새끼 양을 구분하고 그 얼룩무늬와 검은 빛 있는 것을 라반의 양과 서로 마주보게 하며 자기 양을 따로 두어 라반의 양과 섞이지 않게 하며

sentences.korean_translation: 야곱은 이 어린 양들을 따로 분리했습니다

sentences.original_text: He took the rest of Laban's female animals
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 라반의 암컷 동물 중 나머지를 가져갔습니다

sentences.original_text: that had marks or were black
In that way he got more animals
sentences.korean_translation: 그 방식으로 그는 더 많은 동물들을 얻었습니다
